tool_description: FX Currency API providing official currency rates. This API provides currency rates for 129 official money units .
name: Currency FX
title: Currency FX

api_list.name: Get Rate Amount With Currency Codes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a specific rate by given currency codes. Rate amount is updated every 15 seconds.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-fx.p.rapidapi.com/currency/EUR/USD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-fx.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-fx.p.rapidapi.com/currency/{is_from}/{to}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-fx.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Available Currencies
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all currencies(129 items) that API supports.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-fx.p.rapidapi.com/currencies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-fx.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
